name: Zombitatos: Ultimate Game Of The Year Edition
description: Zombitatos: Ultimate Game Of The Year Edition is the remaster of the classic point and click game ''Zombitatos: the end of the Pc master race'' In this game you play has Jon and Jack in their crazy adventur to save the world from the zombies! Are you ready to experience Zombitatos for a second time?
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows Xp / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.5Ghz Processor or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: *It can work on almost any pc*
